about.introduction:
After 2 years of working in Biotechnology field, I realized this is not my passion and I decided to start over again in Software Development industry.

Intrigued by curiosity and creativity in building interesting applications, I know that I chose the right path.

Seeking to work in an environment that will help me improve my knowledge and develop my skills in Web Development Process, while allowing me to contribute to the continued growth and success of your organization.

Contact me via ðŸ“§ linhtran.atwork@gmail.com | View my CV

projects.title: Belle E-commerce
projects.summary: This is an fullstack e-commerce web app with basic features
projects.description:
Features

  • Login, Register and Login with Google and Facebook
  • User's profile: update avatar, username and story
  • Searching users by name and username
  • Texting features: sending text, emoji and picture
  • Enable users to reply a specific message
  • For group-chat features: able to add more and remove members as the host role and leave group as the member role

Technologies

  Backend
  • MongoDatabase
  • NodeJS
  • Socket.IO
  Frontend
  • ReactJS and Redux
  • Socket-Client.IO
  • Material UI

References
